img_above_text:
![Wukong Brook 15.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/5/56/Wukong_Brook_15.jpg)
Though he begins with his hands tied, Non-Able is an expert fighter who can utilize some deadly kicks and deal immense damage and can strike with little warning. Any time you see him angle his head down to your right, be ready for a roundhouse kick to spring out fast.
img_below_text:
He'll often follow this very fast kick with a jump kick, but delay it in the air before striking to lure you into dodging early, and then follow up once he lands with a spin on the ground for extra damage at close range.
![Wukong Brook 17.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/05/Wukong_Brook_17.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 56 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:

Though he begins with his hands tied, Non-Able is an expert fighter who can utilize some deadly kicks and deal immense damage and can strike with little warning. Any time you see him angle his head down to your right, be ready for a roundhouse kick to spring out fast."
            - Following Text: "He'll often follow this very fast kick with a jump kick, but delay it in the air before striking to lure you into dodging early, and then follow up once he lands with a spin on the ground for extra damage at close range.
![Wukong Brook 17.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/05/Wukong_Brook_17.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts an intense combat scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," featuring a character named Non-Able executing a powerful roundhouse kick. The snowy landscape serves as the battleground where Non-Able, despite having his hands tied, demonstrates his expertise in martial arts by delivering a swift and damaging kick to his opponent. The preceding and following text describe Non-Able's combat style, highlighting his ability to follow up with a jump kick and a ground spin for additional damage, emphasizing the need for players to anticipate and react quickly to his attacks.
